definition: fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Rice paper is the unique paper produced in our country.
sentences.chinese: 宣紙是我國獨特的紙製品。

sentences.english: This kind of xuan paper with hidden veins adopted the processing method of "translucidus notepaper ".
sentences.chinese: 這種帶暗花的宣紙使用了“透光箋”的製作方法。

sentences.english: Shiuan paper (chinese writing painting paper), hand-made, uncoated, in rolls or sheets.
sentences.chinese: 手工制宣紙，未塗布，捲筒或平版。

sentences.english: The Xuan paper is a kind of high quality paper made in Xuancheng, Anhui Province.
sentences.chinese: 宣紙是產於安徽省宣城的一種高質量的紙。

sentences.english: Over sixty percent of the rice paper used here is made in the south.
sentences.chinese: 這裏使用的宣紙百分之六十是南方製造的。

sentences.english: I think that many people are making exploration on the materials of rice paper and ink.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得很多人都是在拿宣紙和墨的材料做文章。

sentences.english: I came to Grandpa's room, looking for my grandfather to be a rice paper.
sentences.chinese: 我來到爺爺的房間，找爺爺要一張宣紙。

sentences.english: The brush on rice paper is a code, just as digital technology is.
sentences.chinese: 宣紙上的筆觸是一種代碼，正如同數碼技術一樣。

sentences.english: It appears as a white, thin translucent membrane with a character similar to rice paper.
sentences.chinese: 它是一層具有與宣紙相似特性的白色半透明薄膜。

sentences.english: The materials are rice paper and mineral palette used to romance traditional Chinese painting.
sentences.chinese: 材料是宣紙，渲染中國畫所用的礦物顏料。

sentences.english: I spread out the paper, pour ink, and began to write.
sentences.chinese: 我鋪開宣紙，倒上墨，開始寫。

sentences.english: Rice paper Chinese ink, brush outline outline.
sentences.chinese: 宣紙潑墨，畫筆勾勒出輪廓。

definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
vertical scroll (painting or calligraphy)/vertical shaft (of a machine)
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
